name: Absorber
description:
Embark on an epic journey in Absorber, the thrilling idle RPG game that puts your strategic skills to the test. As the protagonist of this captivating adventure, you possess a unique ability to absorb the strength and skills of the enemies you defeat. Will you rise above the challenges and become the ultimate warrior?

key Features

  • Unique idle RPG mechanics: Absorb the strength and skills of defeated enemies
  • Skill trees
  • Strategic gameplay with various playstyles
  • Engaging dungeon exploration and boss battles
  • Idle progression system for continuous character growth
